code: @Test public void testSeda() throws Exception {     template.sendBody("seda:testme", "Hello World").     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("test:seda:testme?timeout=0").         }     }).     context.start().     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
